AI Description: BBTools is a suite of bioinformatics tools designed for use with high-throughput DNA sequencing data. It includes various programs for read trimming, error correction, reference mapping, metagenomics analysis, and more.
Core Features: Some core features of BBTools include read trimming to remove adapters and low-quality bases, error correction to improve read accuracy, reference mapping for aligning reads to a reference genome, metagenomics analysis for taxonomic classification of sequences, and various utility programs for filtering and manipulating sequencing data.
